resources.string: This application requires the permission to change the system settings.\n\nYou need to grant this permission manually.
Please tap on \'Allow permission\' and restart the application
Set the maximum timeout (in seconds) to wait before turning off the screen.
As an alternative (the preffered method), you can enable the Screen Off Global Action Performer Accessibility Service, which requires no settings or permissions.

Required in Android Pie or higher in order to be able to perform GLOBAL_ACTION_LOCK_SCREEN which can turn off screen without requiring a timeout.\n\nThis is the preffered method for devices running Android Pie or higher.
